item.title: Hell Stew Eagles
item.description: So I found out Robbie Daymond voices both Hubert and Zhao,

item.title: Carefree Saint
item.description: Secret Santa present for one of my good friends---Figured it'd be fun to draw one of his favorite characters like it was oil on canvas but digital.

item.title: Shannan's Training
item.description: Drew this for Kith and Kine Zine depicting Ayra correcting Shannan's form in his training.

item.title: Njörun
item.description: Another FE Compendium entry, this time Quan, Leif, and Altena's ancestor Njörun. I s2g Gae Bolg was the biggest pain in the ass to draw

item.title: Beyond the River
item.description: Did this for Invincible Zine depicting Rein and Olwen's conversation in chapter 22 of Thracia.

item.title: Glamrock Meteor
item.description: In 2018 there was a fan project to draw Fire Emblem characters as if there were members of glamrock bands, and I drew Ayra. Her design was partially inspired by the outfit Alissa White-Gluz of the death metal band Arch Enemy wore at their 2018 NYC concert.

item.title: Two Sword Princes
item.description: Drew Ryoma and Shannan for Together We Ride which is themed around putting classic and newer gen Fire Emblem characters together. I chose Ryoma and Shannan for a bunch of reasons: they're both some of my favorites in all of FE, they're long hair princes that became kings of their respective country with a holy sword, and they have crippling guilt complexes over something that happened when they're too young to actually do anything about it.

item.title: Dark Blade of Od
item.description: Drew Galzus for the FE Compendium project. Galz is one of my favorites from Thracia 776.

item.title: Meteor Strike
item.description: Ayra unleashing her special Meteor Sword technique on some poor schmuck.

item.title: Thyra Designs
item.description: 2 items; Designs for Dream of Five Character "Thyra" Long Tingyu, in both armored and unarmored states.

item.title: Essa
item.description: 8 items; Design for the protagonist of an upcoming project

item.title: Death From Above
item.description: Drew this for an official AC Black Flag art competition and made it to the finalists.
